title: Define Project Requirements (Revised)
description: Develop a comprehensive list of requirements for the AI Urban Planner system. This will include user stories, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, constraints, key performance indicators (KPIs), and architecture design considerations. Engage stakeholders from various domains such as urban planning, environmental science, local government, community representatives, end-users, code-architect, frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer to ensure comprehensive coverage of requirements and alignment with diverse perspectives. It is essential to consider incorporating feedback from all involved parties during this process. Additionally, the requirements should be organized in a clear, concise, and easily understandable format for all stakeholders.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, scalability considerations, and performance optimizations. Ensure modularity and maintainability of the architecture. Also include a plan for testing and security measures.

title: Design Scalable Data Model for Urban Planning Data Storage and Management
description: Design a scalable, efficient data model for storing and managing urban planning data. The data model should support complex queries, analytics, housing, population, environmental, and quality of life metrics. It should be designed with considerations for future growth, handling large volumes of data, ensuring data integrity, and adhering to industry best practices for data modeling. This task involves creating entity-relationship diagrams, defining data types, and specifying indexing strategies.

title: Develop AI Optimization Algorithms
description: Develop and implement AI algorithms for optimizing urban housing development based on the defined requirements and constraints.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AI Urban Planner system, allowing users to input data, view results, and interact with the system.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline with enhanced security measures (Revised)
description: Implement a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the AI Urban Planner system. The revised pipeline will include steps for linting, unit testing, integration testing, advanced security scanning, code review, artifact management, deployment to staging and production environments, and post-deployment monitoring. To ensure the robustness and reliability of the system, the pipeline will be designed with a focus on maintaining quality, speed, and security. Additionally, the pipeline should be modular and extensible for future improvements. The pipeline will also include the following updates: (1) Automated code analysis tools to improve code quality, (2) Integration with the project's version control system for efficient deployment, and (3) Implementation of security measures such as secure secret management, code signing, and vulnerability scanning.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures (Updated)
description: Update the description to reflect a more comprehensive approach to security: Implement a robust security framework encompassing authentication, authorization, data encryption, secure communication protocols, and regular security audits. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) and industry best practices and standards (e.g., ISO 27001, SOC 2). Implement secure coding practices, such as input validation, output encoding, and protection against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF, SQL injection). Establish a security incident response plan, regular security testing and monitoring processes. Implement secure DevOps practices, including secure code repositories, secure build and deployment processes, and secure infrastructure management. Specific tasks include: implement multi-factor authentication, follow OWASP principles, perform regular vulnerability assessments, establish a bug bounty program, ensure encryption of user data at rest and in transit, and enforce least privilege access. Update the task to clarify dependencies on 'Design System Architecture' and 'Define Data Models'.

title: Create Comprehensive Test Suite (Updated)
description: Develop a robust and modular test suite for the AI Urban Planner system. The test suite should cover all core functionalities, edge cases, and error handling scenarios, ensuring the system functions as intended under various conditions. It will include unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests to verify system behavior across different layers of the application stack. The test suite design should accommodate for future expansions and updates to the AI Urban Planner system. To ensure comprehensive coverage, consider using code coverage tools like Istanbul or Coverage.py. Additionally, document the testing strategies and methodologies in the test suite for better understanding and maintenance. Due to the complexity of the project, break down this task into smaller subtasks as needed. Consider integrating existing testing tools such as Jest or Pytest for smooth implementation and ease of use by the development team. Collaborate with the designated project manager to ensure alignment with the overall project goals and timelines.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation for the AI Urban Planner system, including architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
